title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8501.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8501.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Records shall
mean those records, documents or other data which are in the custody of the
office. (b) Payroll record shall
mean an itemized record setting forth the name, business address, title and
salary of every officer and employee of the office. (c) Records access officer shall mean the

Director of Program Planning and Administration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8501.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
